page.title: 17KILTARLITY FREE CHURCH
page.content: Kiltarlity Free Church of Scotland operates within the old parish boundaries and for administrative purposes is linked with nearby Kirkhill.About 75 families are members of the congregation.There are two services on Sundays and a children's Sabbath School.In addition a prayer meeting is held on Wednesday evenings and a Friday Fellowship during winter months discusses topical,controversial or practical subjects.Missionaries, mostly from Third World countries visit occasionally and report on their work. The minister,Rev.R.Kilpatrick and his family live in the old manse at Camault Muir,and there is another manse in the village with 7ha of land presently with 6 ewes.Mr.Kilpatrick is one of the chaplains for Tomnacross school where Mrs.Kilpatrick is a part time remedial teacher.
